discription: The Sign In page allows users to access their existing accounts by entering their credentials. Users are prompted to provide their email or username along with their password. The page features a "Sign In" button to submit the login information, and it may include links for users to recover their passwords or navigate to the registration page if they do not have an account. This page is essential for user authentication and ensures that only registered users can access personalized features and content.
name: sign in

discription: The Sign Up page enables new users to create an account by providing essential information such as their email, username, password, and role (e.g., user or brand). Users are guided through the registration process with clear input fields and a "Sign Up" button to submit their details. Additionally, the page includes links for users to sign in if they already have an account and options to register using third-party services, such as Google. This page is crucial for onboarding new users and ensuring they can access the application's features securely.
name: sign up
